nodes.title: About API Node
widgets_values:
[About API Node](https://docs.comfy.org/tutorials/api-nodes/overview) | [关于 API 节点](https://docs.comfy.org/zh-CN/tutorials/api-nodes/overview)

To use the API, you must be in a secure network environment:

- Allows access from `127.0.0.1` or `localhost`.

- Use our API Node in website services starting with `https`

- Make sure you can normally connect to our API services (some regions may need a proxy).

- Make sure you are logged in in the settings and that your account still has enough credits to cover the consumption of API calls.

- On non-whitelisted sites or local area networks (LANs), please try to [log in using an API Key](https://docs.comfy.org/interface/user#logging-in-with-an-api-key).

---

要使用API，你必须处于安全的网络环境中：

- 允许从`127.0.0.1`或`localhost`访问。
- 在带有 https 开头的服务中使用我们的 API Node
- 确保你能够正常连接我们的API服务（某些地区可能需要代理）。
- 确保你已在设置中登录，且你的账户仍有足够的积分来支付API调用的消耗。
- 在非白名单站点或者局域网（LAN），请尝试[使用 API Key 来登录](https://docs.comfy.org/zh-CN/interface/user#%E4%BD%BF%E7%94%A8-api-key-%E8%BF%9B%E8%A1%8C%E7%99%BB%E5%BD%95)

The camera then slowly pushes forward toward his face, ending in a close-up. The mood is cinematic and introspective. Shallow depth of field, dramatic lighting, soft shadows, 24fps film look.
